com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.widgets

Class MapWidgetButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.widgets.MapWidget
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.widgets.MapWidgetButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable, MapDisplayEvents

    public class MapWidgetButton
extends MapWidget
    Shows a filled button with an icon and text next to it. To handle the click, override MapWidget.onActivate().

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw()
        Description copied from class: MapWidget
        Called when the widget should be re-drawn onto the map display. When this is called, the old area the widget was displayed has already been cleared.
        Overrides:
        onDraw in class MapWidget

      • fillBackground

        public static void fillBackground(MapCanvas canvas,
                                  boolean enabled,
                                  boolean focused)
        Draws the background texture for a button onto a canvas, filling it entirely. For filling only a portion, use a view.
        Parameters:
        canvas - to draw on
        enabled - whether button is enabled
        focused - whether button is focused
